statements: DELETE FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_id = 1 AND asset_type = 'image';
DELETE FROM music_assets WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM artwork_assets WHERE medium = 'Oil on Canvas' AND artist_name = 'Jane Smith';
DELETE FROM artwork WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM music_files WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe' AND duration > 180
DELETE FROM artwork WHERE size = 'Large' AND creation_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM royalties WHERE royalty_amount < 1000 AND recipient_owner_id = 12345;
DELETE FROM digital_assets WHERE upload_date < '2022-01-01' AND artist_name = 'John Doe';
